name: Superior_Attuned_Superior_Command_of_the_Mastermind_A
display_name: Superior Attuned Superior Command of the Mastermind A
display_fullname: Boosts.Superior Attuned Command of the Mastermind A
display_help: UNIQUE -- No more than 1 enhancement of this type may be slotted by a character. Enhances the damage of a power by {Boost.Attrib.Damage.Scale}% and accuracy by {Boost.Attrib.Accuracy.Scale}%. This enhancement can only be slotted in a Mastermind pet power.
display_short_help: Set: Superior Command of the Mastermind
power_display_names: Superior Command of the Mastermind: Accuracy/Damage
